highlights: Leading the planning and development of BIYU's comprehensive technology stack and architecture.
Coordinate the development team, facilitating code reviews to ensure quality and efficiency.
Provide regular updates and insights to the CEO, assisting in strategic decisions.
Planning and Building out BIYUs ReactNative application.
Working tightly with the design team to improve the UX of BIYU's Next.js-React storefront website.
Extending the pre-existing Nuxt-Vue back-office software.
Implement backend features using NestJS and TypeORM.
Creating and implementing cross company component system with the design team.
Planning out and implementing features of Pickatale's native iOS Application using Swift and ObjectiveC.
Implementing the ebook reader for Pickatale's native application using Webpack and SwiftUI.
Implementing a mailing microservice with a templating engine using NestJS.
Managing a development team of 4 developers.
Reporting to and planning out sprints with the CTO.
Building interactive Unity based 3D configurator.
Implementing Three.js based 3D inspectors of products.
Building online tool for communication between users and monteurs of solar panels.
Frontend Web Development using various technologies.
Leveraging ReactJS, AngularJS, and Angular 2+ for frontend applications.
Building backend applications and managing databases.
Frontend Web Development for various clients.
Maintaining and extending backend and frontend implementations.
Developed VB.Net extensions for internal CRM software.
Authored maintenance scripts using Bash.

awards.title: Communication Design Excellence
awards.summary: Awarded for the Vodafone Devices Website, this accolade recognizes outstanding design and development in communication, emphasizing a meticulous attention to detail and a user-centric approach. The site showcases Vodafone's latest products through compelling visuals, photorealistic renderings, and interactive animations, reflecting the campaign's slogan 'Take a closer look'. The project highlights innovation in delivering an engaging user experience and a seamless responsive design.

awards.title: Innovative Product Design - Honourable Mention
awards.summary: Recognized for its exceptional design, the muun mattress received an Honourable Mention in the Product Design category. This innovative mattress showcases a modular design allowing adjustable comfort and firmness, integrating high-quality materials like raw silk and latex foam. Its design excellence lies in its functionality, adaptability, and the unique addition of a secret pocket, reflecting a commitment to both aesthetics and user-centered innovation.
